MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH43 and TD1 postcode areas of Galashiels and Walkerburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:41am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to replace a damaged pole affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:19pm on Thursday, 11 February 2021
